title: Module Manager
description: UI-based module manager for your LifeForge instance

modules.title: Modules
modules.description: Install, update, and remove modules from your LifeForge instance

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Organize and reorder sidebar categories to customize your navigation

category.title: No categories found
category.description: Create a category to get started

modules.title: No modules installed
modules.description: Install modules from the registry to extend your LifeForge

uninstall.title: Uninstall {{module}}?
uninstall.description: This module will be removed from your system but your data will be preserved. You can reinstall it anytime from the registry.

enable.title: Enable Dev Mode
enable.description:
Enabling dev mode will load this module directly from source instead of pre-built bundles. Changes to the module's codebase will hot-reload instantly without requiring a rebuild.

Use this when actively developing or customizing this module.

disable.title: Disable Dev Mode
disable.description: Disabling dev mode will switch back to loading from pre-built bundles. Make sure you have rebuilt the module to include your latest changes.

devMode.label: Dev Mode
devMode.disabled: {{module}} is no longer in dev mode
